mapper.select: SELECT "Taisyou1"."shikibetsuCode" AS "識別コード", "Taisyou1"."kanaMeisho" AS "氏名カナ", "Taisyou1"."shichouzonCode" AS "市町村コード", "Taisyou1"."meisho" AS "氏名", "Taisyou1"."wkKannaiKangaiKubun" AS "wk管内管外区分", "Taisyou1"."yubinNo" AS "郵便番号", "Taisyou1"."jusho" AS "住所", "Taisyou1"."saiyuusenjyuushu" AS "バーコード住所", "Taisyou1"."banchi" AS "番地", "Taisyou1"."katagaki" AS "方書", "Taisyou1"."gyoseikuName" AS "行政区", "Taisyou1"."kannaiKangaiKubun" AS "管内管外区分", "Taisyou1"."setainushiMei" AS "世帯主名称", "Taisyou1"."dainoukubunmeishou" AS "代納区分名称", "Taisyou1"."banchiCode" AS "番地ｺｰド", "Taisyou1"."gyoseikuCode" AS "行政区ｺｰド", "Taisyou1"."chikuCode1" AS "地区コード1", "Taisyou1"."chikuCode2" AS "地区コード2", "Taisyou1"."chikuCode3" AS "地区コード3", "Taisyou1"."setaiCode" AS "世帯ｺｰﾄﾞ", "Taisyou1"."zenkokuJushoCode" AS "住所ｺｰド", "Taisyou1"."hihokenshaNo" AS "被保険者番号", "Taisyou1"."seibetsuCode" AS "性別" FROM "DbWT2009AtenaShikibetuTaisyou1" AS "Taisyou1" UNION SELECT "Taisyou3"."shikibetsuCode" AS "識別コード", "Taisyou3"."kanaMeisho" AS "氏名カナ", "Taisyou3"."shichouzonCode" AS "市町村コード", "Taisyou3"."meisho" AS "氏名", "Taisyou3"."wkKannaiKangaiKubun" AS "wk管内管外区分", "Taisyou3"."yubinNo" AS "郵便番号", "Taisyou3"."jusho" AS "住所", "Taisyou3"."saiyuusenjyuushu" AS "バーコード住所", "Taisyou3"."banchi" AS "番地", "Taisyou3"."katagaki" AS "方書", "Taisyou3"."gyoseikuName" AS "行政区", "Taisyou3"."kannaiKangaiKubun" AS "管内管外区分", "Taisyou3"."setainushiMei" AS "世帯主名称", "Taisyou3"."dainoukubunmeishou" AS "代納区分名称", "Taisyou3"."banchiCode" AS "番地ｺｰド", "Taisyou3"."gyoseikuCode" AS "行政区ｺｰド", "Taisyou3"."chikuCode1" AS "地区コード1", "Taisyou3"."chikuCode2" AS "地区コード2", "Taisyou3"."chikuCode3" AS "地区コード3", "Taisyou3"."setaiCode" AS "世帯ｺｰﾄﾞ", "Taisyou3"."zenkokuJushoCode" AS "住所ｺｰド", "Taisyou3"."hihokenshaNo" AS "被保険者番号", "Taisyou3"."seibetsuCode" AS "性別" FROM "DbWT2009AtenaShikibetuTaisyou3" AS "Taisyou3"
